name: MetricSchool
0:
”Alexa, open Metric School.”
”Alexa, ask Metric School to tell me a metric fact.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: metric school
des: Whether you already use International System of units (Metric) or just started to learn, this Alexa skill will help you give both beginning and advanced tips, tricks and hacks. If you learn 50+ facts, you will already know more than an average person that was born in a metric country. USA is the only country today that has not converted to metric units, or at least committed, even though The Metric Conversion Act of 1975 made the metric system of measurement as the preferred system of weights and measures for United States trade and commerce?
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
